item.title: PBS, NPR stations working to cope with — and survive — government funding cuts
item.description: A month after Congress voted to strip public media of public money, PBS and NPR stations are working to cope — and survive

item.title: Comic-Con Africa draws thousands of fans and cosplayers to Johannesburg
item.description: Comic-Con Africa has drawn tens of thousands of fans to Johannesburg

item.title: China protests Taiwan foreign minister's visit to the Philippines
item.description: Taiwan’s foreign minister has flown to the Philippines with a high-level delegation of investors, according to two senior Philippine officials

item.title: Volkswagen faces historic $30 million compensation for Amazon labor abuses in Brazil
item.description: Brazil’s labor court has ordered Volkswagen to pay about $30 million for collective moral damages
